002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.Cart;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CartDraft;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CartDraftBuilder;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CartUpdate;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CartUpdateAction;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CartUpdateActionBuilder;
014
015public interface ByProjectKeyCartsRequestBuilderMixin {
016    public ByProjectKeyCartsByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
017
018    public ByProjectKeyCartsPost post(CartDraft cartDraft);
019
020    public default ByProjectKeyCartsByIDPost update(Versioned<Cart> cart, List<CartUpdateAction> actions) {
021        return withId(cart.getId()).post(builder -> CartUpdate.builder().version(cart.getVersion()).actions(actions));
022    }
023
024    public default ByProjectKeyCartsByIDPost update(Versioned<Cart> cart,
025            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<CartUpdateAction, CartUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
026        return withId(cart.getId()).post(builder -> CartUpdate.builder()
027                .version(cart.getVersion())
028                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(CartUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
029    }
030
031    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<CartUpdateAction, CartUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyCartsByIDPost> update(
032            Versioned<Cart> cart) {
033        return builder -> withId(cart.getId()).post(b -> CartUpdate.builder()
034                .version(cart.getVersion())
035                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(CartUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
036    }
037
038    public default ByProjectKeyCartsByIDDelete delete(Versioned<Cart> cart) {
039        return withId(cart.getId()).delete().withVersion(cart.getVersion());
040    }
041
042    public default ByProjectKeyCartsPost create(com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CartDraft cartDraft) {
043        return post(cartDraft);
044    }
045
046    public default ByProjectKeyCartsPost create(UnaryOperator<CartDraftBuilder> op) {
047        return post(op.apply(CartDraftBuilder.of()).build());
048    }
049}
